Levels.Description: I wish I had a future that clear
You could almost see grandma flipping her middle at you from up there
Not a single fucking cloud in sight!
“It’s a wonderful day to be at the beach. The cloudless sky means nothing’s going to ruin our day!” Yeah, except your darn face.
Just as spotted as the last surface you fucking wanker masturbated on.
The soft, woolly blanket of indifference.
Dull (\ˈdəl\) : lacking sharpness of edge or point; also tedious, uninteresting. Ex: the sky, you. See also: lacking brilliance, lust, zest or action.
Can’t you see it’s fucking white??
Just like a warm blanket of sperm. Or rotten milk.
Looks like shit splattered over a canvas
I've seen guerrilla soldiers less threatening
Absolutely fucking dreadful.
Black as the bottom of a dead horse bum
Darker than the morning coffee your mother serves
I’ve known shadows fucking brighter than this sky
Yet another day ends
Shoiny!
Brighter than any foreseeable future
Open your motherfucking window and go soak up some sun, nerd
Drier than that chicken casserole you're so proud of
Dry as a four weeks old turd on the pavement by a battering fucking thousand suns.
Having sex someone this dry is an excellent way to force peel your penis skin off.
Dry as a fucking bone.
Barry White's armpits
Moisture level : fuckable.
As humid as the god-forsaken Guyena jungle in between your arse cheeks
Any human this wet is a slippery slope to sin.
Wetter than your mom watching Fifty Shades of Grey
Basically Africa

Can't even bother to look outside for 2 seconds to notice it's raining and ask me instead?
Better hope your dumb ass didn't forget their umbrella like last time
Wetter than Thatcher's grave
Testicles turn to ice-icles
Ladies, time to freeze some ovaries before its too late!
Did you know? It is entirely possible to freeze a long turd and stab someone with it by this temperature.

Go and grab daddy some ice outside, would ya?
Too cold to think, but that never really was an issue for you was it?
Colder than a witch’s tit
They tell you water freezes at around this temperature, which is quite exactly how much attention you deserve.
The musquitos are coming back for you
I'm getting all sweaty here
Un-fucking-bearably hot

Not a breeze in sight, kind of like your social life
